= Introduction =

Reco-gnizr : Web Widget using gnizr data for bookmark recommendation


= Details =


Develop a JavaScript widget that can be embedded in any Web page to recommend bookmarks. The use
of this widget is similar to which of the Google AdSense. Instead of recommended targeted ads,
widget will recommend bookmarks to the readers.

Things to consider:
 * How do you decide what bookmarks to recommend?
 * Do you need to perform content scraping? When and how?
 * Do you allow readers to give feedbacks on the quality of the current recommendation?
 * Configurable features for the users
